datasets.name: dataset1
queryLines:
SELECT  published_at,
        YEAR(DATE(published_at)) AS published_at_year,
        CONCAT(YEAR(DATE(published_at)), '-', LPAD(MONTH(DATE(published_at)), 2, '0')) AS published_at_year_month,
        MONTH(DATE(published_at)) AS published_at_month,
        DATE(published_at) AS published_at_date,
        title,
        description,
        body,
        language,
        name as author,
        image,

        categories,
        topics,
        topics.name as topics_name,
        industries,
        entities,
        
        source.domain,
        source.home_page_url,
        source.location.country_name,
        source.location.country_code,

        summary,
        keywords,
        links,
        media,
        
        is_breaking,
        sentences_count,
        paragraphs_count,
        words_count,
        characters_count,

        ai_language,
        ai_summary,
        ai_country,
        ai_city,
        ai_latitude,
        ai_longitude,

        getdata_timestamp,
        eh_enqueued_timestamp,
        etl_processed_timestamp
FROM    dad_open_data.news.clean_news

datasets.name: da5353d2
queryLines:
SELECT  -- news attributes
        N.etl_rec_uuid,
        N.published_at,
        YEAR(DATE(N.published_at)) AS published_at_year,
        CONCAT(YEAR(DATE(N.published_at)), '-', LPAD(MONTH(DATE(N.published_at)), 2, '0')) AS published_at_year_month,
        MONTH(DATE(N.published_at)) AS published_at_month,
        DATE(N.published_at) AS published_at_date,
        N.title,
        N.description,
        N.body,
        N.language,
        N.name as author,
        N.image,

        N.categories,
        N.topics,
        N.topics.name as topics_name,
        N.industries,
        N.entities,
        
        N.source.domain,
        N.source.home_page_url,
        N.source.location.country_name as news_country_name,
        N.source.location.country_code,

        N.summary,
        N.keywords,
        N.links,
        N.media,
        
        N.is_breaking,
        N.sentences_count,
        N.paragraphs_count,
        N.words_count,
        N.characters_count,

        N.ai_language,
        N.ai_summary,
        N.ai_country,
        N.ai_city,
        N.ai_latitude,
        N.ai_longitude,

        N.getdata_timestamp,
        N.eh_enqueued_timestamp,
        N.etl_processed_timestamp,

        -- surveys attributes
        S.id as survey_id,
        S.title as survey_title,
        S.description as survey_description,
        S.question_type as survey_question_type,
        S.min_value as survey_min_value,
        S.max_value as survey_max_value,
        S.scale_min_label as survey_scale_min_label,
        S.scale_max_label as survey_scale_max_label,
        S.created_at as survey_created_at,
        S.closure_type as survey_closure_type,
        S.expires_at as survey_expires_at,
        S.is_active as survey_is_active,
        S.show_results_on_close as survey_show_results_on_close,
        S.allow_multiple_responses as survey_allow_multiple_responses,
        S.allow_custom_options as survey_allow_custom_options,
        S.require_comment as survey_require_comment,
        S.rating_icon as survey_rating_icon,
        S.is_anonymous as survey_is_anonymous,
        S.resource_type as survey_resource_type,
        S.user_id as survey_user_id,
        S.reasoning as survey_reasoning,
        S.generated_at as survey_generated_at,

        -- surveys options attributes
        O.id as option_id,
        O.option_text as option_text,
        O.option_order as option_order,
        O.created_at as option_created_at,
        O.user_id as option_user_id,

        -- locations attributes
        W.*
FROM    dad_open_data.news.clean_news AS N
LEFT OUTER JOIN dad_open_data.news.survey_ai AS S
  ON    N.id = S.resource_news_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN dad_open_data.news.survey_options_ai AS O
  ON    S.id = O.survey_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN dad_open_data.locations.world AS W
  ON    N.ai_city = W.cities_name

datasets.name: 3dc5db43
datasets.displayName: Survey Insights with Linked Options Dataset
queryLines:
SELECT  *
FROM    webdemocracy_database_catalog.webdemocracy.surveys AS S
LEFT OUTER JOIN webdemocracy_database_catalog.webdemocracy.survey_options AS O
  ON    S.id = O.survey_id
